name: DefragMe
description:
Defragment a QRcode, delve into it, save the memory and flee the system.

This game takes you from puzzle to stealth to reaction based levels aswell as from 2D to 3D perspective and will grind your gears. Hack guards and bypass firewalls to reach your goal and don´t get lost in the code!

This game is the polished version of a 10 Hour gameproject which resultet in the first stage of DefragMe. It got featured @RadiusFestival and @CentralEuropeanGamesConference.

Be aware, you´ll need a QRcode reader on your smartdevice to play this game!
